Package hw03.gizzon.battleship

Class GameSim

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw03.gizzon.battleship.GameSim
  • public class GameSim
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameSim class is used to simulate the process of BattleShip. This GameSim class contains the names of both players, as well as their boards and the board dimensions. It also contains gStates, which allows the class to change it's game state.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameSim​(java.lang.String p1, java.lang.String p2, int row, int col)
      The GameSim constructor initializes the the names of the players, creates an array to eventually hold the boards of the players, and will hold the dimensions of the board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSim

        public GameSim​(java.lang.String p1,
               java.lang.String p2,
               int row,
               int col)
        The GameSim constructor initializes the the names of the players, creates an array to eventually hold the boards of the players, and will hold the dimensions of the board. The boards though are intially set to null. This will create a new instance of the game.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Player 1's name
        p2 - Player 2's name
        row - the number of rows in the board
        col - the number of columns in the board

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        The reset() function will reinitalize and restart the game by clearing the boards and change the gState to "INIT".

      • shootMove

        public void shootMove​(BattleshipStates player,
                      int row,
                      int col)
        The shootMove() function will simulate a player making a shot on their opponents board. This function will take the name of the player who is making the shot, and the coordinates of where they are shooting on the board. The isHit() function will then be called to verify wether the hit was succesfull for not.
        Parameters:
        player - the name of the player shooting
        row - The row in which the user shot
        col - the column in which the user shot

      • isHit

        public boolean isHit​(BattleshipStates player,
                     int row,
                     int col)
        The isHit() is used to check wether a shot that a player took on their oppononets board was a succesful hit or not. If the player makes the shot, the function returns true, ellse.. fale.
        Parameters:
        player - the name of the player shooting
        row - The row in which the user shot
        col - the column in which the user shot
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating wether the shot was successful or not.

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner​(BattleshipStates player)
        The isWinner() function is used to check wether a player has hit all of the opponents ships and th egame is done. This is done by taking the name of the player you a trying to check if they won, and then looking at the opposite players board. If their board is has nothing on their board besides empty water(-1) and hit shits(0), then that player won
        Parameters:
        player - the name of the player shooting
        Returns:
        A boolean whether the given player won or not.

      • resize

        public void resize​(int row,
                   int col)
        The resize() function allows the size of the boards to be changed in between the games when a new board is loaded.
        Parameters:
        row - the number of rows in the new board
        col - the number of columns in the new board
